alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 4:27PM CDT until July 17 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Eastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fordland, or 15 miles east of Ozark, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elkhead, Oldfield, Bruner, Garrison and Keltner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
